# iosurfacePlane

**Instance Property**

The number of a plane within the underlying surface instance for the texture, if applicable.

## Declaration

```swift
var iosurfacePlane: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The plane number applies to the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture/iosurfacePlane] property when it isn’t `nil`. The property’s value defaults to `0` for textures that don’t come from an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/IOSurface/IOSurface] instance.

## Getting information about the IOSurface the texture was created from

- **iosurface**: A reference to the underlying surface instance for the texture, if applicable.
